Best Tyrosine Supplements: Improve Focus, Relieve Stress With These Top Picks https://www.medicaldaily.com/partner/best-tyrosine-supplements-improve-focus-relieve-stress-these-top-picks-472170 Tyrosine, also known as L-tyrosine, is an amino acid that serves as a building block for all proteins in the body. It is synthesized when the body obtains sufficient amounts of another essential amino acid, phenylalanine.
